content: Like it when it works, issues started today. It now will let me use one time, and then if I go back in it just keeps flashing between the front screen. It won't even allow you to attempt to type anything, because by the time you would even try to get to search bar, it flashes, repeatedly, non-stop. If I clear cache it will let me use app one time, and then if I go back in, it starts the flashing again.

Can't switch no more, between US and Canada, after a last update of the application!!! It was a breeze to switch between, in a previous version. I am not an easy to confuse user and I have wasted few minutes looking for the darn switch option, still had not found! Just how evil SW guys can be to just change interface for millions of users, just like that; completely silly, irresponsible, evil and vicious!!!!!

The apps has lost its basic function. Want to search by category forget it. Amazon is trying so hard to be everything they forget the one thing that was helpful. Same with Amazon Music...they removed the Genre grouping in that app. I don't want to be sold something...I want to search for something to buy. The app is just as horrible as their delivery service these days. I now buy more product locally than in the past 10 years...it is less frustrating.

This is such a buggy app that it is unbelievable that it comes from a company as big as Amazon. The app is slow and takes forever just to do the simplest things. With each update I hope they fixed the problems with the app, but they never do. They just add stupid features no one asked for and leave the bugs. And this isn't app specific, but if an order qualifies for free shipping, the free shipping option should be the default instead of having to search for the option to opt in to it.

Poorly designed with poor service and poor customer support. I lost access to my phone number and was hoping I could get my account back by contacting customer support - too bad that you have to be signed in to contact them. I created a second account and wanted to add it into the app, the app just loads indefinitely and nothing happens. I will never understand how such a huge company can get away with some of the worst designed apps on the internet.

I use this app often to order online however lately things get stuck in my cart when I try to delete them or save them for later or if I place one in my cart it'll say there's multiple of the same product in my cart and won't decrease. I also don't like that you can't leave a review on a product if you haven't paid for a prime membership. Would love it if people who can't afford a membership were given the ability to leave reviews and ratings as well.

As many people do, I absolutely love Amazon! My only problem is that more often than not, after using the app (and sometimes during use) it will freeze on me and I end up having to restart my phone. Otherwise I would give 5 stars. So before you ask, yes my phone has the latest Android version and the app itself is up to date. I've also tried uninstalling and reinstalling it. Still happens. üòü

I've been having 2 major issues with Amazon. First, they take payments multiple times, refund them, and then take them again, throwing my whole bank account out of wack. This has put me in a bad situation multiple times, most recently I paid $117 for an item, only for Amazon to give it back without notification, and then take it out again but charging me $3 more on the second withdraw...causing me to go over my credit card limit by $2. Thanks Amazon, now I'll have to pay a $45 over limit fee.

Language Keeps on Switching! I loved shopping in this app but the past weeks I have been so annoyed with the language setting. It was always Eglish but one time I opened it, it was in French. I didn't know where to go lest I press the wrong thing. I was able to find a link online that went straight to the language settings, saved it and thought that was it. Nope.... everytime I open the app it would go back French. I keep on changing it and saving it but the problem repeats itself.

This would have been at least 4 star review some months back. I don't use Amazon often but when I had in the past I was cool with the service. Now once I type in a search of anything I will maybe(big maybe) get a 1st page result...most of the time I get nothing. Just a white screen with the loading circle of death... eventually a really cute dog pic pops up with the "Whoops something went wrong" "Try again?" I don't want to try again... uninstalling ‚òÆÔ∏è

Had been avoiding the new update after reading lots of negative reviews about the new interface. The options to switch Amazon country disappeared so I was forced to do so. Don't appreciate the breaking change. Also, as other users have reported, the app doesn't take account the space required for the keyboard tray. The keyboard overlays the input fields when opened - e.g. when giving a list a name - so the user cannot see what they are typing. Very poor.

Edit 12/26/2021: This app is a bit better, but still lacks big-time. It's hugely inconvenient that I cannot search review keywords in the Amazon app but can on their website. Bumping from two to three stars based on improvements. Original review: This app feels very outdated. It's slow and laggy, buttons (like share item) are really tricky to find. Overall an embarrassingly bad experience from a company as large as Amazon.

Since the last update, so many functions aren't working. From the "my list" column to placing things in the cart. And the app just suddenly closes. Having a frustrating time just waiting for it to open information on products, such as the pics or info. Takes a great deal of time for the pages to open, then the app will suddenly close. It IS NOT my phone or internet, as all other apps are functioning normally. This just started after the lastest update. Getting worse since the last review!

I downloaded to take advantage of a promotional offer, placed my order, promotion not applied, customer service said promotion was expired, nothing they can do. Message box hidden when contacting cust service makes difficult to see what you are typing. I placed one order and app worked fine. There were no issues with using the app and seemed easy enough to navigate.

The app is getting worse, not better. You have to click so many times to see what was on the home screen before. The app is slower. Viewing past orders is more complicated, and when you try to see what you bought the app either throws an error or just goes back to the home screen (forcing you to start all over). And to mention waaayyy too many sponsored items showing first for almost a whole page, horrible for a company who already make too much profit off of their employees backs.

Consistent shipping delays and app error issues along with customer service being very unhelpful. I pay money for two day shipping, gets told it will be 3 to 5 business days instead. And then 10 days later hopefully my packages show up. On top of that, the app won't even display the order, let alone allow me to track it. I understand that sometimes stuff happens, but with the consistency it's been happening can only result from gross negligence and shotty workmanship.

I'm honestly going to cancel my prime. Nothing comes as quick as promised, multiple packages were lost. The app is hard to navigate, you can't find anything anymore. And finding the menu? Forget that. More times than not, nothing will load. The last item that I purchased no longer shows up in the purchases history. Even though it did when it was first shipped out.

App is alright other than the fact that it constantly switches language. If someone sends you a link to a product when they were browsing in a language other than the one you have set in your app, it automatically switches to that language in your settings. Sometimes a google search for a product returns the link in french for some reason (on web) so I am constantly having to put it back to english. Please fix this, it is so annoying

App is broke and no longer functional . I tried to uninstall and install few times . Alot of times app won't load after a sign in , it gets frozen on white blank page , or app asks for OTP that doesn't get sent even if previously selected " don't require OTP on this browser " So in both cases , can't even log in anymore . App is just useless icon in the phone . Actual Site works fine , mobile and desktop .

You'd think the richest man in the world would be able to commission a half decent app but no. This app is slow, buggy, and feels old and clunky. I went to my language settings and touched nothing and now my account is in Spanish, it was one of my two options sure, but now everytime I select English it just won't change. I have to wrestle with this slow app to get the right size for clothing, because I select my size and then when I add it to my cart it's back to the default size. I ran out of s

Not sure what's going on. This app has always had issues loading or would crash in the middle of something I was doing just for it to go back to the main page-annoying. But now it just doesn't work. Reviews don't really load to read or are missing? I couldn't retrieve the scan code for Prime members to use at Whole Foods. When I click on products the page keeps saying UHOH which I can't help but read in a ScoobyDoo dog's voice due to the pic that shows up every time when something goes wrong.

The latest version of this app, which has been out for a while now is substandard compared to earlier versions. It's extremely laggy, clunky to use when it loads up and regularly freezes as it tries to load (which also takes a lot longer than it used to). Access to your account, orders and wishlists which used to be on the side and were streamlined and speedily accessed are now along the bottom and are also extremely laggy and slow to load. This version of the app is a chore to use.

Order got delayed multiple times, absolutely no tracking history updated for almost a week. App started hiding the order from me so it was harder to find. Cancel the order because there's no updates. Then I find out they were going to deliver it today. I have video of the app hiding my order from me and a screen shot showing the tracking history.

Amazon shopping is a great app! I have used it now for several years and the only thing I have ever had difficulty with ordering are shoes...just never seem to order the correct size no matter how closely I follow the directions. But the interface is great, great search engine and you can find everything on here. Definitely worth checking out if you're new to online shopping very easy to navigate.

I normally have had really good experiences with Amazon & with my last few orders, my experiences have been negative. I ordered one item a couple of weeks ago, it was marked as delivered, but I never received it & it didn't get delivered to my neighbors either. I was refunded for that order. I ordered the same item last week & I get an email this morning saying that it has shipped, but I check my Amazon account & it says that the item is undeliverable & my order has been canceled. Not happy.

I was trying to make another account with the same phone number cause I don't use me last account. It keeps saying "failure to connect" so I went to my account (this one) and tried to verify it to disable it but whenever I clicked on the link, it never worked. I really like Amazon its just things are confusing now. It used to be so much more simpler.

Newer app is unfortunately slow and takes forever just to load menus to get to where I need to go. Whomever thought it was a good idea to change the menu system is now my mortal enemy. Edit: Lowered to one star as the new menu at the bottom is so obnoxious and makes browing with one hand near impossible without accidentally going somewhere else.

This app is terrible now. The rearranging of everything is such a pain. But 3 things make it garbage: 1. They hid the contact customer support behind several more screens and clicks. 2. The text box for customer service is covered by the keyboard and you can't see what you're typing. 3. Errors causing it to not go to the cart, checkout, or other sections require closing the app and restarting to fix it.

ETA: Saw a ton of recent reviews saying the app isn't working, slow prime shipping, etc.; wanted to say that I've been a customer for years, prime for a couple years, and have ordered TONS lately with 0 problems!!! I use this all the time to shop. I prefer it over the website because I'm usually on my phone while shopping. It is very easy and intuitive for tracking packages/returns/orders & order history. I also love the AmazonSmile feature, something I found through the app.

Amazon is no longer fast even with Prime membership. The shipping has been getting slower and slower. I now have to wait over a week for anything I am needing. That gives me a whole week to go to the store & buy it my self. It comes down to money vs. time. Yes sometimes! Amazon has a better price but you have to wait a stupid amount of time to get it. Not to mention your already paying monthly for a subscription, so unless your buying thing all the time your item just secretly went up. Canceled

I've been through the process of app down loads and synch them. After 2 weeks of trial I have yet to get the cameras to register with the cloud or initialize the camera. I am really disappointed with your product and its capabilities. Wish I had read some reviews and watched the videos of the down falls of the W6 system. If I had I surely would of gone with a bluetoothable system. But out of 2weeks of trial and error I have yet to get the cameras to work. 4 paper weights is what i got.

revised 20/12/21: Amazon's excellent service continues with this App which now incorporates their grocery shopping app, with slots often just a few hours later. Good customer service. But...Notifications are excessive. And why send tracking updates to my phone if delivery is to another address? Equally, Alexa items get auto-registered to your account and if to be a gift it can't cope. A confusing accounts/orders/credits system makes it impossible to check and can't be done on the app.

Great app, but needs an improvement. A specific one. You see, in chrome, I right click on the link, and make a group tab. I can then go back to the page later, while I'm checking out the other products I've searched for. This way, I save time by simply clicking on all the ones that look interesting, and then switching to the new tabs to get more info. But I can do it all at once. Here, I do not have this option. Hence a 3 star. You'd greatly increase to a 5 star if you made this change.

It seems after the latest updates the app is extremely buggy. When I try to access my cart by clicking on the icon and rarely ever takes me to my cart. Instead I am redirected to a host of other advertisements. I'm not entirely sure if this isn't something Amazon did on purpose to sell more products but it's annoying since I'm forced to close and reopen the app several times to access my cart.

Can't checkout. So yhe entire point of Amazon is to sell stuff. The cart no longer shows items added to the cart yet they appear in the cart. Once you go to the cart and click on proceed to checkout the screen refreshes but never proceeds to checkout. Uninstall and reinstall did not work nor, did contacting customer service service. Finally, the apps redesign buried many of the quick link and menu items.

I can rarely use the app because 95% of the time it gives me a page with a dog on it and says "uh oh, something went wrong on our end". I've been getting this message close to a year now, have upgraded phones, uninstalled/reinstalled it numerous times and nothing fixes it. Family with Samsung phones have the same issue as well! Amazon you're better than this.

BEWARE!! This app is a scam. I would add things to my cart, get the total price. Go to place my order and it is +$10 more with no reasoning. The shipping page with all the fees and delivery details does not show up. I understand there are additional fees, obviously. But to charge me over an extra $10 with zero reasoning behind it is simply theft. When I spoke with costumer service, I was promised a fix and my money returned. Well it's been well over 2 months and no return of money taken. SCAM!!

I think it's time to start breaking up this app into multiple apps. Too clunky. Also the fact that I can't use the Google auto complete for password is a big drawback for me too. I sometimes want to place an order when I'm in a public place and don't feel comfortable entering my password. I end up just not ordering the impulse so ends up helping me in a way.

I ordered an item from Amazon and found out that the item came from one of their vendors who will not stand behind the product as advertised. I thought I was returning it to Amazon and found out after making the trip that the item had to be returned to UPS instead of through the Kohl's store. My point is that the website is cluttered and hard to read and sometimes hard to understand. It needs to be reorganized entirely and changes from the usual routine need to be highlighted.

I had had the worst delivery experiences ever since I came to UAE. Not once, but three times. Yesterday, I had a delivery of a simple phone case. I wanted to make sure it was original. The delivery guy called just 5 minutes prior to the delivery and I was outside and the time period was impossible. He was adamant that he won't be returning for the day, if I miss it, and left it with the security. Turned out the case is a fake. Now I have to return it. No way to rate the delivery experience.

It's now really hard to contact Amazon through the app. I'd never be rude to customer services but by making it hard to contact you is ensures that people are more likely to be angry when they contact you. It now involves trying to work out the best phrase that will allow you to eventually choose the chat option. It is mot consistent. Had to go to a friends to borrow a computer to contact them in the end as no success in contact on app this time.

been using this app for years, within the past 6mo the quality of this app has taken a huge nosedive. it constantly stalls out, taking multiple attempts opening and closing the app to load the front page, randomly giving you "oops something happened" dogs as you browse, and most infuriating, if you have things in the cart/saved for later you will often get "important message about something in your cart" that is totally unclickable and will go away, leaving you guessing what it could have been.

STILL a rubbish app now.... STILL bloated out with no common sense to its layout... far to much going on, Everything about your account, settings, history etc is difficult to find and use.... Shortcuts: no description of where these are, but did find them. And 'My Stuff' needs to be at the top of this shortcut list. And why not make the shortcut list customisable... Most options take too long to load up, or do not load up, or the app freezes.

Issues with last two updates: Interface is now optimised for oversized screens, so on normal smart phones (not compact sized, just normal) more of the screen is wasted to oversized icons. Some of the icons don't even show up, not sure why. For example I have no idea what stars I'm giving when reviewing products, because the stars are not visible. They are there and clickable, but not visible. Other, similar functional issues. Devs: Please give us a setting where we can revert to older UI.

Horrible. Amazon is up to some sneaky business. Account set up and prime sign up is extremely easy. However, to end prime subscription an email has to be sent at your request. But there will never be a confirmation asking if you intended to have prime or not. Just charge the card, charge a card from a year ago no problem. Multiple charges at once for prime or any other services and its not the first time. These people are in everyones pockets charging subscriptions with no one the wiser.

A company too big for its own good. And their useless, disinterested so called customer services. When things go wrong, no way to put it right. Amazon you suck, at so many different levels, but that's what happens when there's zero accountability. So easy to hit that click to 'Buy Now' button but have a problem, issue, query, no one's interested. The deal is done and end of story.

In general the app is great. Easy to use. The reason for an average review is how they show the invoice in the app. It does not necessarily match how they bill the credit card. To really see that we have to use the website. We waste so much time trying to figure out what some of the charges are from Amazon due to their app. Why can't they show the actual billing in the app like they do on the website!? Extremely frustrating. Almost forced to order one thing at a time or waste our time.

If you leave this app open, even with back ground data turned off, it will eat data doing God knows what indefinitely. I don't know what it's downloading, but after getting 2 months of overages where my family inexplicably used 6GB more data than any other month in the last ten years, I started tracking usage. On my phone this so 6 used 4GB of data in it's own with minimal active use. I removed it and have to use the web page, but it does the same thing even in lite mode so it's wifi only now

I've had a lot of problems with Amazon lately. It won't accept just about any of my cards Visa or not. And there is definitely money there. They don't send a notification when they say you have to "change payment method" and still push the shipping back so had I not checked we would have just been waiting and waiting. Just wish the app cooperated for me and that customer service was actually helpful.

Lacks essential features the web interface provides. Amazon's web site allows one to search all reviews of a product for specific words or phrases, such as searching for the words "smell" or "odor" or "burning rubber" when researching a product which might or might not set off my allergies. This app does not allow one to do these kinds of searches. It also appears to load Amazon product pages slower than Chrome.

The filtering option lacking of options therefore I must browse lots of items that's nowhere near close to what I am looking for. This can be used as a forced advertisement for things I'm not interested in at all. Apart from the search and filtering issues, the application is an excellent job, gets the job done for what it's made for. Easy to use, fast and easy , efficient.

Not worth it anymore, they're sell outs to cheap goods and push their own brand Amazon Basic, which isn't any better, terrible quality. Prime offers a small selection of streaming offers, and even if you pay for VoD, you can still be charged per movie title. The free shipping is a lie, they still charge you sometimes. The app itself is not good for a company of this size, but then again your workers are treated like .... as well.

I don't buy through Amazon. I prefer a more personal ordering experience. And Amazon should not store all my credit cards and have a very difficult 'delete my account' link and Amazon told me they just follow me from bank to bank if I change banks. Plus, we're going to lose our country unless we stop importing. That will put a damper on Covid spread also. I buy US goods, services. You asked.

Highly overrated I am definitely not getting my money's worth out of this. I don't know about you but the 2 Day deliveries turn into a week. Never new movies, super old everything. Why $15 a month for something useless? Not worth it. Neighbors don't pay $15 a month and they get better service on regular Amazon that I do on Prime.. ü§î UPDATE : Actually getting worse... Prime Videos no support / display probs nonstop normal filters aren't available as well especially while shopping

The checkout page needs to be more user friendly because sometimes an item appears with free shipping on the listing but when I go to checkout the total is a ridiculously high amount (because free shipping doesn't apply on some items shipped to Puerto Rico), and it doesn't take me directly to the page where I can see the shipping charge. I have to move to a laptop where I can see a summary of the whole order before paying and figure out why I'm being charged $20+ for shipping.

As soon as this update took place it started shutting down with a pop up screen saying Amazon mp3 app is being closed. It has done this over 3000 times since the app updated. I tried to update it again, got the pop up. Unloaded the app and then reinstalled the app. Tried to open the app and the pop up came up again. Something needs to be done because I cant shop because of this.

I made a couple selections and went to pay at the checkout. Instead, an offer came up for $100 off of this purchase if I paid through affirm. I did. Had to pay 15% finance charge but I figured I was still ahead with the $100 off offer. Neither Amazon nor affirm is honoring the $100 offer. Both of them have asked for screen shots of the offer. This is bait and switch. Fraud.

Works as expected. Buy for Amazon smile you must have notifications turned on, luckily there aren't too many notifications that come thru. But when you select the notificatiin that says a donation to your selected charity... it brings up an error page every time. No option in the app to report an issue or suggest an improvement so I'm leaving this here in hopes it will be fixed.

Firstly Jeff bezos is corrupt. Secondly this app is super glitchy, it's impossible to get to the chat to get help they make it so many steps that aren't intuitive. Once you finally got to the chat to get assistance it's super glitchy, the keyboard keeps getting in the way of where I'm typing, I've tried all the troubleshooting because I've been in tech for 15 years, all they do is just send me an email that tells me to uninstall and reinstall the app.

Far too many distracting pop up ads and invasive sponsored content. It is difficult to find the information for the item you are looking at amidst all the erroneous nonsense that pops up trying to get you to look at other products. I had to uninstall it. It became unusably frustrating. I am already shopping on your site. Stop bombarding me with ads!

For me there is one design choice that I really hate. I'm dyslexic which means I rely heavily on voice to text programs. This app won't let me use the voice to text program that comes default on my phone. It forces me to use the Alexa one. When I try to do a search for a product I want to buy it will sometimes try to do other things. For me this is incredibly annoying. I have to go to somewhere else in my phone and copy then paste it into this app just to search for something to buy.

It had worked great until a few days ago. Now nothing...this is so bizarre how are all of Amazon's apps suddenly not working? I just noticed today that both audible and prime video are also having issues. I can't use my credits on audible and the video player won't play back anything so what's the point? Btw have already tried downloading the updates and restarting my device and no issues using other apps. Get it together Amazon!

Normally I'm very happy with this app but lately it has been frustrating me so much. It's not allowing me to save or delete items from my cart which is preventing me from ordering anything. I need a few of these items for Christmas but others can wait. If i can't remove items I'll have to order from target or wal-mart again. Very disappointing.

Make sure you deactivate your previous device if you get a new one because if you isn't you will never be able to log in with your account. And don't bother trying to get support from them because they have nothing but canned responses about orders and password resets even when you clearly state what the issue is.

Slow, laggy, buggy. This is the only app on my phone that is so unresponsive and slow. A lot of videos won't even play. If you click on a customer photo it's blurry but if you scroll to any other photo it looks fine. The organization of info on pages is a mess but that's the same on the website. Also no dark mode sucks at night.

They changed the layout to be really inconvenient. At least now I dont impulse shop because seeing the screen fills me with rage. It used to be perfect and now I cant even see a whole picture when I scroll. I literally cannot zoom out anymore and the whole screen is one picture. Also it vibrates when i try to add things to my cart or buy things and now i dont use amazon except for holidays

Been an Amazon customer for years with no issues but suddenly the app cannot be updated and is no longer available on playstore. I'm able to use the app. As it was installed prior to whatever was changed but afraid to try to reinstall as that would remove the app. From my s5e leaving me unable to reinstall as it is no longer available on playstore using this device.

Customer service link doesn't work, keeps logging me out and not accepting my password. Doing it via browser too. The whole service is broken. And I can't get a refund on the things they haven't delivered but have marked as if they have unless I return the item or get a voucher to my account. Why would I want to pay for another thing that might not turn up though?!

Some Good, Some Bad. I hate, having to have an account to browse the websites. I don't like accounts, never have, never will. But as for shopping.... Amazon has everything under the sun. And, the prices..... for the most part are pretty good. But I like being able to kick the tires (so to speak) so prefer to spend my money in the brick, and mortar establishments. Sorry Amazon, but am impressed with the concept.

I have been looks for 3 days on how to add a friend on this damn app and nothing I'm not trying to manage my house hold I'm not trying to share one list I'm trying to let my friends see my public list. Everytime I send a link it just sends them to their list so they can share one. Nothing is showing how to do this. I have one friend from when I made my account but I cannot replicate this its like they have removed this as an option all together soo annoying and ridiculous.

Changes I would make: custom content - I have NO interest in women's clothing or toys and don't want to see those, dark(er) theme - too BRIGHT! It gives me a headache, in-store codes - A) allow choice of payment to differ based on venue B) a previously set up SNAP/Link/EBT cards aren't available and it would be great to make it a default for whole foods & Amazon Fresh C) payment with a card MUST NOT be the default! Allow for prime savings with alternative payment methods.

This is a good app but it takes forever to load! I always used their website which is faster. Even with the new update, it's still slow! Also, the app cannot be refreshed. Lastly, I don't like that there's a default list. I look for many things on the app and hate when an item goes to the wrong list.

I love Amazon. The new shipping service is the worst. I hate the Amazon Drivers. I miss the actual two day shipping prime offers. I miss when Ups would deliver my packages by noon almost every time. Not only did I not receive my recent package on time, but the Amazon drivers always seem to take too long to deliver, always super late at night. More often then not. And I hate it. Its just unacceptable service.

I used to love amazon. I've been with them since 24 now I'm 31. I hate them now! I tried to write a review on an item and was told my account was flagged for being suspicious when all of my items are verified purchases. They deleted all my reviews. They always deliver my stuff to the wrong address! I have now ended my prime membership and I am waiting on the last item to come so I can delete my amazon account forever. They also made it hard to talk to customer service. Amazon is pure trash now!

Search results are plummeting so far into the depths I can no longer use them. I go to Bing or Google to find what I am looking for. This greatly diminishes your value. I am paying yearly for cheaper shipping and that's the final differentiation. Call it Amazon Shipping and you have it more accurate.

Solid app easy to use. Get it set up with your shipping info and payment information etc and it's a breeze. You can ship to other people makes Christmas buying and shipping to remote places easy easy easy. Really like it because I can order stuff for my parents and have it delivered on a subscription to them so I don't have to worry about that. Really great. Love it thank you Amazon

Product descriptions are so badly translated they make no sense whatsoever. I cannot use the app in English while shopping in the Italian marketplace... (WHY??) So, I end up shopping on a foreign marketplace (to find decent product descriptions) and ship them to Italy anyway... Thankfully I can read French, Spanish, and German. However, English would be nice, regardless of my location. That's NOT nice, dear Amazon. It really sucks. -4 stars for the headaches.

Works ok. I had a delivery person only use the Shopping app to notify me of delivery. The app has no sound notifications, but thankfully my neighbour let me know I got the package. Please enable audio notifications. I'm running an Android 11 phone, and still no audio notifications. I see a significant amount of negativereviews for this app. Maybe these are from people using older phones. I'd say that is a problem.

1) Some searches that I do for specific items bring up many things that have nothing to do with item searched for. 2) Sellers no longer provide accurate delivery data. Multiple times the item is not actually shipping until after this app the date this app says the item is being delivered. 3) Delivery drivers are scanning items as delivered before they get to delivery location and actually deliver them. 4) Too many accidental hits on "influencer videos" while I am scanning through as well.

Fast shipping is a thing of the past. Has my subscription cancelled for a while. Gave it another shot and my first order is delayed. In fact, every order says "sorry we're running late." The tracking gives vague information on where my package is. Picked up by carrier. Delayed in transit. Really? That's all amazon can tell me? Once I get my items I'm cancelling my subscription. I been having a better experience on eBay.
